subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: On his Twitter page, Levi Leipheimer, who is Lance Armstrong’s teammate, wrote that he was about to have surgery, so doctors could insert a screw into the wrist to stabilize it.
snippet: On his Twitter page, Levi Leipheimer, who is Lance Armstrong’s teammate, wrote that he was about to have surgery, so doctors could insert a screw into the wrist to stabilize it.
